thread.title: Amazon sale offers deep discounts on 2 different USB flash drives
thread.title_full: Amazon sale offers deep discounts on 2 different USB flash drives - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Amazon sale offers deep discounts on 2 different USB flash drives
text: If you’re in the market for a new ultra-portable USB flash drive, today is your lucky day. Don’t buy one down at your local big box electronics retailer unless you enjoy spending more money than you need to. Instead, check out this sale Amazon is currently having, which offers solid discounts on three different USB flash drives made by Samsung. One model has 32GB of storage and the other has 64GB of space, and they both feature a great compact design. This sale ends on Saturday, October 17, so be sure to grab one while you can. All models include free Prime shipping. Samsung 32GB USB 3.0 Flash Drive Fit (MUF-32BB/AM): List price $29.99, now just $15.99 Samsung 64GB USB 3.0 Flash Drive »
